benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Defy Death
effects: You have Advantage on Death Saving Throws.

benefits.name: Speedy Recovery
effects: As a Bonus Action, you can expend one of your Hit Point Dice, roll the die, and regain a number of Hit Points equal to the roll.
